remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了前面所述，此类的成员的行为完全如 、和 文档所述。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **冻结功能：** 因为它继承自 类，所以 类提供若干特殊功能： 对象可以声明为、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关 对象提供的不同功能的详细信息，请参阅可[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 对象派生自 ，因此在使用这些对象时将复制它们。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，稍后可能无法检索或删除使用原始 对象添加到集合中的 。Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object. 集合中的 是原始 的副本，被视为不同于你添加的 。The in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added. 如果尝试添加**null** （**Nothing**）引用，此实现将引发 。This implementation throws an if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将从第一个 开始向前搜索集合，然后在最后一个 结束。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与 的值成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 也就是说，此方法的运算复杂度为 O （*n*），其中*n*等于 。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to .
